snippet: With the latest employment report as a backdrop, Fed policy makers will gather later this month, a meeting that offers an opportunity for aggressive action.
abstract: Christina D Romer Economic View column predicts the next meeting of Federal Reserve policy makers will probably be contentious; contends the latest disappointing employment report will make some members want to take additional expansionary action, while others appear steadfastly opposed; calls for aggressive Fed action.
lead_paragraph: With the latest employment report as a backdrop, Fed policy makers will gather later this month, a meeting that offers an opportunity for aggressive action.

headline.print_headline: It’s Time for the Fed To Lead the Fight
headline.seo: It’s the Fed’s Time to Step Up - Economic View
headline.main: It’s Time for the Fed to Lead the Fight
